Program Description \n(guideline): Rebate of $1.16 per sq ft for insulation. Attic (flat ceiling) and already insulated attic kneewalls capped at a rebate of $0.77 per sq ft.
Contractor Restrictions: All upgrades must be installed by a participating service provider.  Find a participating service provider.

Program Description \n(guideline): Tiered air sealing rebate (see link) ranging from $310 to $770 based on reduction of air loss.
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
• Tiers are based on
reduction of air loss from
initial testing with blower
door
Contractor Restrictions: All upgrades must be installed by a participating service provider.  Find a participating service provider.
